title: Death penalty: Man convicted of rape, murder of minor
description: 'My son was a grade three student. He was going to school when he suddenly went missing. We later found his dead body from an abandoned house,' said Karim Bux Qambrani. The convict, Mohammed Iqbal Shah, was convicted of murder and rape in addition to separate 10-year and nine-year jail term.

title: Harassment at work: LHC takes notice of traffic warden's complaint
description: Female traffic warden appeared before the Multan regional police officer and said Superintendent Malik Nazar Abbas, the chief traffic officer, had raped her at his office. She said that she had gotten pregnant as a result.

title: Rape case suspects arrested
description: Shahid had left his 15-year-old disabled daughter at home in Lahore. While they were away, two men, Murad and Ahmed, entered the house and assaulted the girl.

title: Victims protest after accused rapists get bail
description: The family of two girls (13 and 15 years old) who were allegedly kidnapped and raped by eight men last month in Rawalpindi staged a demonstration after a court granted bail to two of the accused.

title: Few hours in Lyari prove 'torturous' for former resident
description: Lyari gangsters in Karachi held a 26-year-old woman captive, asking her for her elder brother's locations. She said when she refused to tell them, they raped her.

title: Woman allegedly kidnapped, raped
description: Suspects made a woman have poisonous tea in Bhalwal and took her somewhere where they allegedly gang raped her. They later left the woman in front of her house and fled.

title: 12-year-old girl ‘raped’ by ‘neighbours’
description: A 12-year-old girl was subjected to rape in Abdullah Shah Ghazi Goth in Karachi when she was standing outside her house during a power failure. The incident came into her family’s notice when she came home and lost consciousness. Separately, a married woman was allegedly gang-raped in Gulistan-e-Jauhar.

title: Lahore rape case: 100 days of justice denied
description: December 22 marked the 100th day of justice denied. A five-year-old girl was raped and left outside Sir Ganga Ram Hospital in Lahore on September 13.

title: CJP Jillani takes notice of five-year-old girl's rape case
description: Chief Justice Tassaduq Hussain Jillani took notice of the non-arrest of those who raped the five-year-old girl in Lahore on September 13.

title: CJ issues 2-day deadline to police over Karachi rape
description: Chief Justice Tassaduq Hussain Jillani took suo motu notice of media reports that a 12-year-old girl was raped by her neighbours in Karachi.

title: Sessions judge asked for report on 4-year-old's rape
description: Four-year-old girl, on her first day at a seminary in Mailsi, was taken to the principal's office where she was later found unconscious on the floor in critical condition. Medical examination confirmed sexual assault.

title: Chief justice orders report of rape investigation
description: Chief Justice Tassaduq Hussain Jillani directed the Inspector General of Police Punjab Khan Baig to submit a report about the investigation into the rape of a five-year-old girl from Mughalpura, Lahore.

title: Two cops booked for 'raping' woman
description: Man said his wife was allegedly kidnapped by two policemen, who kept her in illegal confinement for eight days in Rawalpindi and sexually assaulted her. They left her at Darul Aman (shelter house).

title: Man accused of rape granted bail
description: Man accused of 'buying' a married woman, raping her and forcibly 'marrying' her was granted bail worth Rs100,000. Woman says she was given a drink by a girl at Minar-e-Pakistan, after drinking which she had fainted.

title: LHC disposes of rape case notice
description: 17-year-old girl was returning from a shrine with her 11-year-old cousin when three men overpowered them and took them to a deserted place where they forced the cousin to rape the girl.

title: Four family members killed by drunken ‘gangsters’
description: Newly-wed M* was visiting her parents when a group of armed gangsters entered their home in Karachi, subjected M and her mother to gang rape and then opened fire at the family, killing four members and critically injuring M.

title: ‘No arrests in child rape case so far’
description: 194 suspects were interrogated in Lahore child rape case but no arrests were made. Former chief justice Iftikhar Muhammad Chaudhary had taken suo motu notice of the case on September 13.

title: LHC seeks report on cop's alleged role in rape
description: Man said his daughter was abducted and molested by a police official and an accomplice in Lahore. The girl's mother said she and her family were getting death threats.
